title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3898/92 of 23 December 1992 fixing the compensatory allowance for Mediterranean sardines of the species Sardina pilchardus
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION  (EEC) No 3898/92
of 23 December 1992
fixing the compensatory allowance for Mediterranean sardines  of the species Sardina pilchardus
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The compensatory allowance granted for  sardines of the species Sardina pilchardus of the Mediterranean as provided for in Article 3 of  Regulation (EEC) No 3117/85, shall be as follows for the 1993 fishing year:
-  sardines, size 3 (E, A): ECU 138/tonne,
-  sardines, size 4 (E, A): ECU 19/tonne.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1  January 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly  applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 December 1992. For the Commission
Manuel MARĂN
Vice-President
